info.name: Mega Ampharos Pokemon Showdown Style
info.description: A Mega Ampharos Pokemon Showdown style made for Pokemon Showdown servers. If you have any question, you can find me at servers such as Origin.
info.additionalInfo:
To see this stylesheet download Stylish and add this style, and then load Pokemon showdown. 
Updates:

    28ᵗʰ June 2015:
      - fixed the rainbow menugroup buttons.

    29ᵗʰ June 2015:
      - Made the "Find a User" button as big as the "Watch a Battle" button.

    4ᵗʰ December 2015:
      - fix battles' CSS.
      - fix background error
